mxCell.value: What is server side rendering?  How is it different from normal React apps?
Why would we use SSR at all?  Its not easy to set up, so what's the benefit?
When should you think about using SSR in one of your apps?
How do you actually set up SSR in a React app?
React apps can't be crawled by a search engine without SSR
SSR is the only way to handle SEO
All apps can benefit from SSR
